post.author: Steven
post.content:
Frank Di Giorgio 토론토 시의원과 The Learning Enrichment Foundation의 공동 후원으로 14개 이상의 공사기업체가 참가하는 취업 박람회.

Job Fair
Sponsored By
Councillor Frank Di Giorgio  and
The Learning Enrichment Foundation

Building Community Partnership
with
The Canadian Forces  Laidlaw Educational Services
OAO Technology Solutions Ontario Place
Budget Rent a Car  Spherion Workforce Architects
Securitas Canada  Toronto Fire Services
Nursejobs.ca   United Parcel Services
Ontario Parks & Recreation LJD Maid Services
Toronto Police Services  Toronto Transit Commission

Friday 15th March 2002
AT The Rotunda, City Hall
100 Queen Street West
10:00 am SHARP
post.title: Job Fair..
